    • OnModifyProductSaveButtonClick

      void OnModifyProductSaveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      RUNTIME ERROR An error I encountered with this program was that the Product's associated parts were not correctly updating on saving or cancelling the modifications. This ended up being cause by me improperly setting Observable Array lists as equal to each other rather than using "setAll" to ensure the lists had the same components. Save Button event that finalizes Product modification and returns to Main Form.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • OnModifyProductCancelButtonClick

      void OnModifyProductCancelButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Cancel Button event that aborts Product modification.
      Throws:
      IOException
